name: Artifact of the Gods
usage: Once you find one, you can use it to achieve incredible things.
description: Artifacts are mystical items that can be found in the world of the Norse Gods. They are powerful and can be used to enhance your abilities or to gain advantages over other players.

name: Freyja's Necklace
usage: Increases efficiency of rune farming on a Tile
description: Freyja posesses many different kind of necklaces. One of them is the Brisingamen, a necklace crafted by the four dwarves Alfrigg, Dvalin, Berling and Grerr. It stands for her beauty and her power. Another one is forged by the dwarves Sindri and Brokkr, the two dwarfes that also created Mjölnir, the hammer of Thor.

name: Freyr's Golden Apple
usage: Gives a flat amount of energy
description: The golden apple is a symbol of Freyr's fertility and prosperity. It is said to bring good fortune and abundance to those who possess it. Refusing to accept a golden apple is a sign of sterility and decay. The apple is also associated with the goddess Idun, who is known for her ability to rejuvenate the gods with her golden apples.

name: Tear of Yggdrasil
usage: Removes flat Energy from another player
description: The well-being of Yggdrasil, the mighty tree at the center of the cosmos, is crucial for the stability of the universe. When Yggdrasil trembles, it signals the arrival of Ragnarök, the destruction of the universe. The tear of Yggdrasil is the sign of a looming catastrophe.

name: Mjölnir Charm
description: The hammer of Thor, Mjölnir, is a powerful weapon which, when it hits the ground, rumbles like thunder. It is said to be forged by the dwarves Sindri and Brokkr, known for their renowned skill in crafting. This little charm brings strength and power to the one who carries it.

name: Fenrir's Bones
usage: Increases efficiency of rune farming on a tile
description: Fenrir is a monstrous wolf in Norse mythology, the son of Loki and the giantess Angerboda. He is destined to kill Odin during Ragnarök, the end of the world. Fenrir's bones are said to be imbued with his ferocity and strength.

name: Hel's Shadow
description: Hel is the goddess of death in Norse mythology, ruling over the realm of the dead. Hel's shadow is said to bring misfortune and despair to those who encounter it.

name: Flame of Muspelheim
usage: Price reduction for purchasables in the next round
description: Muspelheim is a realm of fire and chaos in Norse mythology, home to the fire giants. A single flame from Muspelheim can be the source of destruction or transformation.

name: Ice Splinter of Niflheim
description: Niflheim is a realm of ice and mist in Norse mythology, home to the frost giants. An ice splinter from Niflheim can freeze the heart of even the most powerful warrior.

name: Blood of Jörmungandr
usage: Increases farming efficiency at the river
description: Jörmungandr, also known as the Midgard Serpent, is a giant sea serpent in Norse mythology....

name: Ashes of Surtr
usage: Erhöht Effizienz Runen-Farmen auf einem Feld
description: Andere Spieler - Preissteigerung kaufbares für nächste Runde (wird multipliziert)

name: Odin's Eye
usage: Erhöht Effizienz Runen-Farmen auf einem Feld
description: überprüft ein Tile und alle angrenzenden auf Fallen und deckt diese ggbf. auf

name: Fenrir's Chains
usage: Erhöht Effizienz Runen-Farmen auf einem Feld
description: Can be found and used to trap a field
